verses.verse: This is the third time that I am coming to you. Any dispute must be verbally established by two or three witnesses.

I have told you before and warn you beforehand, as if I were there already the second time. Now even though I am absent I write to those who have sinned and to the others, that if I come again, I will not spare.
Since you are looking for proof of Christ speaking in me, (He is not weak with you but powerful among you
for even though it was in weakness that he was crucified, yet he lives by God's power. For we also are weak with him, but we will live with him by God's power toward you.)
examine yourselves to see if you are in the faith; test yourselves. Don't you, yourselves, know that Jesus Christ is in you--unless you are castaways?
I am confident that you will know that we are not castaways.
Now I pray to God that you won't do any evil, not in order that we may appear to be approved but that you should do what is right though we might seem as castaways.
For we cannot do anything against the truth only for the truth.
For we are happy when we are weak, and you are strong. We also pray for your complete restoration.
Therefore since I am absent, I write these things, lest when present I might be too sharp, according to the authority which the Lord has given to me for edification but not for destruction.
Finally brethren, good bye. Be restored, be comforted, be unified, live in peace, and the God of love and peace will be with you.
Greet one another with a holy kiss.
May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ and the love of God and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all. Amen.
